org.eclipse.emf.refactor.common.core.ui
Interface IGuiHandler

public interface IGuiHandler

Interface used for specifying gui topics of a specific model refactoring.

Author:
Florian Mantz

getParent

showInMenu

boolean showInMenu(java.util.List<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> selection)
Specifies whether the model refactoring can be invoked from the context menu of the given selection context.

Parameters:
selection - Invocation context of the model refactoring.
Returns:
true, if the model refactoring can be invoked from the context menu of the given selection context, false otherwise.
